actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a tax credit to small businesses for filing forms required by Federal law.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a credit against the individual income tax in the amount of $5 for each form or document which a small business is required by Federal law to file with the United States Government or any agency or establishment thereof during the taxable year.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a tax credit to small businesses for filing forms required by Federal law.
